metadata.title: Marc Stevens Women's Relaxed Jersey V-Neck T-Shirt - MS87005
features: Made from 100% airlume combed and ringspun cotton, 32 singles
Athletic Heather and Black Heather are 90% airlume combed and ringspun cotton and 10% polyester
Heathers/Blend Colors are 52% airlume combed and ringspun cotton and 48% polyester
Triblends are 50% polyester/ 25% airlume combed and ringspun cotton/ 25% rayon, 40 singles
Casual tee perfect for any occasion
Available in a variety of colors and sizes
description: Here is a deal you don't want to miss. This v-neck t-shirt is so soft and comfortable, perfect for any occasion. It is a high-quality product made with serious attention to detail. It has a relaxed stylish fit but offers the ultimate comfort. The tee is available in a large variety of colors and sizes to choose from. Try one today - this casual tee is one you can never go wrong with!
